title: Netanyahu Criticized For Making Iran Nuclear Deal An 'Israel Issue'
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with Ari Shavit of Haaretz about Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's visit to the U.S. Congress on Tuesday, where he'll make his case against an American nuclear deal with Iran. Shavit says that while Israelis share Netanyahu's concerns about Iran, they worry his approach and visit to Congress will erode relations with the U.S.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
